Html: it would be in WPP V2
Is it possible to just edit the associated .xml file or would that cause problems?

Yes, you can start creating a new Custom update, just set a return code "static = 0", "Ok". And when the custom update wizard close, edit the xml file. You can see where it is, in the Update Creation Wizard (Files window). Generally it's :
c:\Users\userName\AppData\Local\Temp\Wpp\RandomFolderName\Guid.xml
Edit this file before publishing
